name: I'm Robin Jose Raju.
about: I'm a Computer Science and Engineering graduate from Amal Jyothi College of Engineering, Kerala, India. I'm currently working as a Software Engineer at Capgemini Technologies Pvt., Mumbai. I always try to learn new technologies to keep up with the trends in the field and lately I have been working in some projects with React. I have done various projects in various fields like IoT, machine learning, web development...
